vote.title: To amend the Police Management Compensation Plan, Ordinance 2715-2013, as amended, by removing, updating, or otherwise modifying language in the health insurance section; and to declare an emergency.
vote.description:
Explanation
This ordinance amends the Police Management Compensation Plan, Ordinance 2715-2013, as amended, by removing language from the comprehensive major medical portion of the health insurance section; and to modify or update language in the vision portion of the health insurance section.
 
 
Emergency action is recommended in order to begin implementation.
 
 
Title
To amend the Police Management Compensation Plan, Ordinance 2715-2013, as amended, by removing, updating, or otherwise modifying language in the health insurance section; and to declare an emergency.
 
 
Body
WHEREAS, it is necessary to amend the Fire Management Compensation Plan by amending Section 8(B) to repeal language regarding TMJ or TMD; and
 
WHEREAS, it is necessary to amend the Fire Management Compensation Plan by amending Section 8(F) to modify or update language with regard to vision coverage; and
 
WHEREAS, an emergency exists in the usual daily operation of the Department of Human Resources in that it is immediately necessary to amend certain provisions of the Police Management Compensation Plan in order to allow for immediate implementation thereby preserving the public peace, property, health, safety, and welfare; 
 
NOW, THEREFORE,
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
See Attachment
